definition: to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: The case-fatality percentages were higher in the highly polluted areas.
sentences.chinese: 致死病例的百分比，在重污染區較多。

sentences.english: Quick removal from the contaminated area is most important.
sentences.chinese: 其中關鍵是快速的從污染區離開。

sentences.english: It's safe to suppose that some contaminated produce got out of the contamination zone.
sentences.chinese: 其是安全的假設一些受污染的產品流出了污染區。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between industrial fluorine pollution and dental fluorosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解工業氟污染區人羣氟斑牙情況。

sentences.english: The worst sufferers of the condition tend to live in highly polluted areas.
sentences.chinese: 病情最嚴重的患者大都居住在重度污染區。

sentences.english: The case - fatality percentages were higher in the highly polluted areas.
sentences.chinese: 致死病例的百分比，在重污染區較多。
